Branching_key2: Agar subah hai, to aap greet karte samay logon ko "Good Morning" kehte hain.
Branching_key3: Aur agar time 12 pm ke baad ka hai to aap logon ko "Good Afternoon" kehte hain.
Branching_key4: Agar, 4pm ke baad ka time hai toh aap logon ko "Good evening" kehte hain
Branching_key5: Agar, raat ka time hai to "Good night"
Branching_key6: Nahi toh, agar aapko time nahi pata toh aap bas "Hi" kehte hain.
Branching_key7: Real life mein alag-alag condition mein hum alag alag Greeting ka use karte hain.
Branching_key8:
Javascript programming mein bhi aap `code` ko alag alag condtion mein alag alag script (`code`) run karne ko keh sakte hain.
Iske liye hum **if-else** conditions ka use karte hain.
Branching_key9: IF-ELSE conditions ke baare mein aur jaane ke liye aap
Branching_key13: Ek webpage banaiye jo din ke time ke anusar visitors ko "Good Morning", "Good Afternoon","Good Evening" ya "Good night" wish kare.
Branching_key14: Javascript mein branching ya alag-alag conditions pe alag-alag `code` run karne ke liye hum kabhi-kabhi *switch* `statements` bhi use karte hain.
